mapper.select: select driver_id as driverId, license_plate as licensePlate, capacity as capacity, vehicle_type as vehicleType, price as price, vehicle_status as vehicleStatus, brand as brand, vehicle_model as vehicleModel from vehicle where vehicle_id=#{vehicleId}

select c.vehicle_id as vehicleId, a.first_name as personFirstName, a.first_surname as personFirstSurname, c.license_plate as vehicleLicensePlate, c.capacity as vehicleCapacity, c.vehicle_type as vehicleType, c.price as vehiclePrice, c.vehicle_status as vehicleStatus, c.brand as vehicleBrand, c.vehicle_model as vehicleModel from person a, driver b, vehicle c where a.person_id = b.person_id and c.driver_id = b.driver_id and c.status = 1
